long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Editorify is a paid app for Shopify platform. 

It allows you to add images, reviews & videos to your Shopify store.

The Chrome Extension works together with the web application.

The Main Features:

- Import Reviews, Images & Videos from multiple wholesalers to your Shopify stores. 
- Customise the review design by colour, font, size and position
